prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a sleek body and elegant fins.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a fish with vibrant colors and graceful movements.
Generate a creature that thrives in oceans, with a mix of blue and pink hues.
Make a whimsical aquatic Pokemon with distinct tail fins and a playful demeanor.
Imagine a small, charming fish Pokemon that embodies the beauty of underwater life.
Design a Pokemon that showcases a smooth silhouette with colorful accents.
Give me a unique water Pokemon that has both elegance and agility in its design.
